reviews.review: very good game for s and d

Honestly, it is just a bad game. Loads of cheaters (even on prime) and overall toxicity. Not to mention graphics design (of course skins have beautiful designs don't get me wrong here) It is remarkable how it encourages gambling too. Apart from this and bugs (famous "get cs:go-ed"), it could be a fun experience (only if you have 5 ppl that you can communicate with, best to play with premades). Would not recommend, unless you want to suffer.

A game which has been around 20 years, I've played it since I was 8, and now I'm 14, I played CS 1.6, and now CS:GO. I remained loyal to this game even in the darkest times, and I don't give a flying fuck about the ones which says that this game is not good, f*ck them, they don't know the game which represents the FPS genre.

Long story short, top 3 game series, and top 3 FPS genre game series ever.
